lead_paragraph: William Caruth, 61, was arrested on Wednesday hours after the body of his 39-year-old daughter, Andrea Caruth, 39, was found in a hole beneath the basement of her home in the Bronx.

byline.contributor: Susan C. Beachy and Doris Burke contributed research.
byline.original: By BENJAMIN MUELLER and NOAH REMNICK

snippet: William Caruth, 61, was arrested on Wednesday hours after the body of his 39-year-old daughter, Andrea Caruth, 39, was found in a hole beneath the basement of her home in the Bronx.

headline.main: Father Charged With Murder in Death of Pregnant Daughter
headline.print_headline: Pregnant Day Care Owner Is Found Dead in Her Bronx Home

abstract: New York City police say they found body of five-months-pregnant Andrea Caruth in basement of her home in Bronx, two days after her boyfriend reported her missing; Caruth's father William is arrested and charged with murder and manslaughter.
